item.name: comp Name of the current JIT compiler
comp Accumulated time spent in compilation
gc Copy number of collections per second
gc Copy accumulated time spent in collection
gc MarkSweepCompact number of collections per second
gc MarkSweepCompact accumulated time spent in collection

trigger.name: 80% os Opened File Descriptor Count used

trigger.expression: {Template JMX Broker:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=JIT code cache",Usage.used].min(3m)}>({Template JMX Broker:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=JIT code cache",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.9)
trigger.name: 90% mp JIT code cache used

trigger.expression: {Template JMX Broker:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=JIT data cache",Usage.used].last(0)}>({Template JMX Broker:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=JIT data cache",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.9)
trigger.name: 90% mp JIT data cache used

trigger.expression: {Template JMX Broker:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=miscellaneous non-heap storage",Usage.used].min(3m)}>({Template JMX Broker:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=miscellaneous non-heap storage",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.9)
trigger.name: 90% mp miscellaneous non-heap storage used
gc Mark Sweep Compact in fire fighting mode
mp JIT code cache fully committed
mp JIT data cache fully committed
mp miscellaneous non-heap storage fully committed
